bio: You just can't refuse orders from the fan on this old Yo-kai's tail. And he loves to micromanage everything he can!

soultimate.name: I'll Take the Lead!
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases ally Attack by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Nearby allies' attack power boosted for a time.

skill.effect: Friend Chance becomes a little easier.
skill.name: Silver Tongue

name: Copperled
